author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Komplett Bank Appoints ‍Jan Haglund as CFO
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Komplett Bank Asa:
* KOMPLETT BANK APPOINTS NEW CFO AND ANNOUNCES CHANGES TO ITS EXECUTIVE
* ‍KRISTIAN SJUVE, CFO, HAS ANNOUNCED HE WILL PURSUE OPPORTUNITIES OUTSIDE OF COMPANY
* ‍KRISTIAN SJUVE, CFO WILL STEP DOWN FROM POSITION AS CFO FOR KOMPLETT BANK WITH EFFECT FROM 1 JUNE 2018​
* KOMPLETT BANK - ‍JAN HAGLUND WILL FROM SAME DATE ASSUME ROLE OF CFO WHILE RETAINING RESPONSIBILITY FOR STRATEGY DEVELOPMENT AND EXECUTION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
